Articles.Content:
Hey,

after a little break I play KSP again.
I use KSP 1.10.1 with a lot of mods (used the same mods in KSP 1.8.1). Now I have a problem. Every Antenna is set to inactive but ther eis no button to activate them. After launching a rocket I can control it till a height of ~100km and then I can`t control the rocket. CommNet says: connected.

Here is my log:

https://www.file-upload.net/download-14399240/KSP.log.html
